::: {#about-block}

The workshop series aims to organize and host 2-3 professional development
workshops every year, hosted online, and freely available to everyone.

All workshops will be recorded and the videos will be available in their
specific pages. Click on a workshop below to view materials.

:::

## Navigating the workshops

__Latest workshops are shown at the top by default.__

Users can use the following to narrow their search for a workshop.

- `Categories`: Search for keywords to find similar workshops
- `Filter`: Filter the workshops by matching words in their titles or date

:::
